statements: DELETE FROM electronic_waste WHERE item_id = 1 AND collection_type = 'e-waste';
DELETE FROM electronic_waste WHERE collection_point_id = 100 AND collection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM electronic_waste WHERE id = 100 AND weight_kg > 5.0;
DELETE FROM recycling_programs WHERE location = 'New York' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM collection_centers WHERE center_name = 'Recycle Hub';
DELETE FROM collection_centers WHERE location = 'New York' AND center_name = 'Recycle Express';
DELETE FROM collected_waste_log WHERE collection_point_id = 3 AND collection_date = '2022-07-15';
DELETE FROM waste_recycling_facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE 'Recycle%';
